snippet: An early draft of a study with recommendations on how New York should adapt in the long term to cope with worsening storms amid climate change and population growth.
lead_paragraph: An early draft of a study with recommendations on how New York should adapt in the long term to cope with worsening storms amid climate change and population growth.

headline.seo: Draft of the NYS 2100 Commission Report
